item.title: How to create diagrams in DoIt
item.description: Note Hugo v0.93.0 or later is required for drawing custom diagrams. Check out the mermaid shortcode if you have to use an older version of Hugo. 1 GoATGoAT Go ASCII Tool is a Go implementation of markdeep.mini.js ’s ASCII diagram generator. To use GoAT, simply place the ASCII input inside a code block with the language set to goat. 1 2 3 ```goat // ASCII input here ``` Here are some examples of generated SVGs using GoAT.
